overview: If you go down to the woods today, you'll get a big surprise. If it's this forest you find yourself in, it won't be bears you find, but hot smooth twinks having some of the best al fresco sex imaginable. Deep in the French forest, this international cast including Eurocreme exclusives Will Jamieson and Anthony Thomas get really hot and sweaty under the summer sun. Fantastic group and duo action throughout the six scenes, this film will wet your appetite for more than escargots!! Bonuses include photo gallery and outtakes.
title: Garçons dans la Forêt
